text: The 1990 ICI European Open was a professional ranking snooker tournament that took place in March 1990 at the Palais des Sports in Lyon, France. John Parrott won the tournament, defeating Stephen Hendry 10–6 in the final. __TOC__ ==Main draw== ==References== Category:European Masters (snooker) European Open (snooker) European Open (snooker) European Open (snooker)
title: 1990 European Open (snooker)
